# mapkit-map



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                    | Type     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- |
| `height`    | `height`    | The height of your map. Defined by css size properties. Example: 500px, 100vh. | `string` |
| `language`  | `language`  | The language code of the language you want your Apple maps to be in.           | `string` |
| `latitude`  | `latitude`  | The latitude of the centre of your map.                                        | `number` |
| `longitude` | `longitude` | The longitude of the centre of your map.                                       | `number` |
| `token`     | `token`     | Your Apple MapKit token. https://developer.apple.com/maps/mapkitjs/            | `string` |
| `width`     | `width`     | The width of your map. Defined by css size properties. Example: 500px, 100%.   | `string` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
